about.globalDesc: Connecting over 10,000 destinations worldwide, from Southeast Asia to Europe and America.
about.missionDesc: Deliver excellent and easy travel experiences for everyone, connecting you with the world.
about.qualityDesc: Committed to top-quality service with the most competitive prices in the market.
about.storyPara1: Wanderlust is the leading travel and lifestyle super app in Southeast Asia. We help you discover and purchase a wide range of travel products, local services, and financial services. Wanderlust's comprehensive product portfolio includes transportation booking services such as flights, buses, trains, car rentals, airport transfers, as well as the largest hotel inventory in Southeast Asia. Moreover, to help you fulfill your lifestyle aspirations, we complement our services with a wide array of attractions, local activities, as well as health and beauty spas. Therefore, whatever your lifestyle choice, you are just one click away!
about.storyPara2: Wanderlust believes that happiness can come in many forms for different people at different times. Therefore, with our reputation and over 10 years of experience, we promise you a rich variety of options to light up your state of happiness. Whether you are looking for an exciting experience or resting in a 5-star resort, a relaxing spa day or a thrilling adventure, a convenient first-class flight or an exciting road trip, for both domestic and international travel, you have it all in one Wanderlust app.
about.storyPara3: With 24/7 customer service in local languages as well as over 30 different local payment methods, Wanderlust has been downloaded over 100 million times, becoming the most popular travel and lifestyle app in Southeast Asia.
about.storyPara4: What are you waiting for? Book a carefully planned trip or a last-minute decision vacation with us. With all your unique travel and lifestyle choices, as always, Wanderlust will accompany you.
about.teamDesc: Professional team with years of experience in travel and technology industries.

faqQuestions.q1: How to search and book flights on Wanderlust?
faqQuestions.a1: Simply enter your departure, destination, travel dates, and number of passengers in the search box. The system will display suitable flights. Select your preferred flight, enter passenger details, and pay.
faqQuestions.a2: We accept credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), e-wallets (ZaloPay), bank transfers, and Wanderlust Wallet.
faqQuestions.q3: Can I cancel or change my ticket after booking?
faqQuestions.a3: Yes, you can cancel or change your ticket depending on the fare rules. Flexible tickets allow free cancellation/changes, while Saver tickets may incur fees. Please check specific conditions when booking.
faqQuestions.q4: How do I know if my flight is delayed or cancelled?
faqQuestions.a4: We will send notifications via email and SMS to your registered phone number. You can also check flight status in 'My Orders'.
faqQuestions.q5: Can I book for multiple passengers at once?
faqQuestions.a5: Yes, you can book for up to 9 passengers in one transaction. The system will ask for details for each passenger.
faqQuestions.q6: What is the checked baggage policy?
faqQuestions.a6: Baggage policy depends on the airline and ticket type. Detailed baggage information will be displayed when you select a flight.
